overview: Simplified Data is a global management consulting firm that helps companies simplify business processes. Their expertise is restructuring sales organizations to make them more solutions-oriented, decreasing the sales cycle while improving revenue and forecasting. In addition to the sales process, they have expertise at re-engineering all major business processes. Simplified Data also has extensive experience building global operating organizations, and establishing strategic relationships to advance their growth. If thereâ€™s anything in your organization overly complicated, Simplified Data can simplify it.
